Articles.Content:
Hey Guys, im going on vacation for 2 weeks..

And I wanted to share what I\'v been up to this 2 days since i got 0.16..

Here it is:

Deuterium Pod-Tipe M

http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/94/001jdu.jpg/

- Bigger brother of my old Beryllium lander..

- One Maned, 3 stage rocket.. 9 engines, and 4800 l of fuel..

- Lightweight and Agile, Multi purpose vessel..

Tipe M is designed for Double landing (1st on Minimus, then on Mun and back to Kerbal in one piece)

While keeping the middle half tank modular, you can replace it with a full sized tank, or you can add additional RCS tank if necessarily...

Please Pm me with thoughts\ improvements about the craft..

See ya soon..

Atimed..
